days.text: Cloudy. A few light rain patches. Force 3 to 4 northerly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Temperature falling. Cold. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
